name: Cat Run (itch) (Shivam Chhapola)
description:
Ahhhh.... I donno what to write here

ahhhhh. this is my first game, ehhh... The game's very easy. I might add different difficulties.

and yes suggest some features you'll like to have in this game and I'll try to add them(I'm still a Noob Game Dev so I cannot guarantee the feature will be added or not)

To play the game on Computer you can press 'Space key', 'Up arrow key' or your left mouse buttton.

And on android you can use a very complicated and scientifically sophisticated constipated method called "TOUCH"

If you are playing it on android browser please make sure you are in landscape mode.

IMPORTANT: I DIDN'T MADE MOST THE ART. IF YOU KNOW THE ARTIST OR IF YOU ARE THE ARTIST PLEASE LEMME KNOW.
